definition: to sit quietly/to meditate/to stage a sit-in
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to sit still and do nothing/to sit tight
akathisia (condition of restlessness, a side-effect of neuroleptic antipsychotic drug)/unable to sit still/hyperactivity/restlessness

pinyin: jing4 zuo4 kang4 yi4 shi4 wei1

sentences.english: I sat very still and looked hard at Barrymore.
sentences.chinese: 我静坐着，眼睛直盯着白瑞摩。

sentences.english: Their sit-ins brought police and national attention.
sentences.chinese: 他们的静坐行为引来了警察和国家的关注。

sentences.english: I can think sitting still as well as standing up.
sentences.chinese: 不论是静坐着还是站起来我都一样能思考。

sentences.english: Sit-ins are a powerful form of non-violent resistance.
sentences.chinese: 静坐是非常有力的非暴力抗议。

sentences.english: SAS scores are sweatiness, akathisia and fatigue.
sentences.chinese: SAS为多汗，静坐不能和乏力。

sentences.english: Does your desire to move often occur when you are resting or sitting still?
sentences.chinese: 想移动的欲望是否经常发生在你休息或是静坐的时候？

sentences.english: My heart sit still, do not raise dust.
sentences.chinese: 我的心静静坐着，不要扬起尘土。

sentences.english: The lifeguards held a sit-in protest at Repulse Bay in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 参加行动的救生员在浅水湾泳滩静坐。

sentences.english: That is where Siddhartha sat in meditation under a tree called the “Bodhi tree”.
sentences.chinese: 那是悉达多在一棵菩提树下静坐的地方。

sentences.english: The miners are staying down for pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们在井下静坐罢工，以要求增加工资。

sentences.english: There is steadiness and calmness that comes from sitting in silence.
sentences.chinese: 静坐下来，你就能体会到那种稳定和静谧。

sentences.english: Patience and the ability to sit silently without making a move are a good start.
sentences.chinese: 非凡的耐心与纹丝不动的静坐也许是个良好开端。

sentences.english: Sit-ins have always been thinking, regardless of one non-chat.
sentences.chinese: 静坐常思己过，闲谈不论人非。

sentences.english: If a person can sit in stillness for the briefest time, he creates merit and virtue which will never disappear.
sentences.chinese: 若能静坐片刻的时间，就有永不磨灭的功德。

sentences.english: Is a in the corridor, the only sit-ins, and pleasure in mind.
sentences.chinese: 是一个人在走廊日影下，只是静坐着，心里愉悦。

definition: to sit cross-legged/to sit in the lotus position
to relax with one's eyes closed
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
to practice Chan Buddhist meditation/to practice Zen meditation/to sit in meditation
